half_double_crochet half_double_crochet cid 39 cid 75 cid 80 cid 81 cid 79 cid 82 cid 64 cid 81 cid 70 cid 76 cid 75 cid 80 cid 28 cid 3 foundation round ch6 sl st to first chain to form ring round 1 ch2 11hdc into ring slip_stitch to join 12 sts round 2 ch2 half_double_crochet in joining chain 2hdc in each st around sl st to join 24 sts round 3 ch2 half_double_crochet in joining chain half_double_crochet in next st 2hdc in next st around sl st to join 36 sts round 4 ch2 half_double_crochet in joining chain half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 2hdc in next st around sl st to join 48 sts round 5 ch2 half_double_crochet in joining chain half_double_crochet in next 3 sts 2hdc in next st around sl st to join 60 sts round 6 ch2 half_double_crochet in joining chain half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 2hdc in next st around sl st to join 72 sts a six skeins original knitting pattern © 1997 drawstring crochet bag http //www sixskeins etsy com rounds 7-11 ch2 half_double_crochet around sl st to join 72 sts round 12 ch3 skip joining st skip 1 st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in previous st forms twisted double double_crochet tddc work tddc around finishing with double_crochet in joining st sl st to top of first ch3 to join forms last tddc repeat rounds 7 - 12 until desired bag height is achieved i did 5 repeats total finishing off with 1 repeat of round 7 edging round ch3 single_crochet in first chain skip 1 single_crochet in next st around slip_stitch to join fasten_off and sew in ends finishing make a drawstring cord and thread through the top row of twisted doubles note this may be done using one of the following methods magicord/i-cord machine or french knitting plaiting crochet chain approx 200 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook
